column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: PAnti-Narcotics Police have cracked down on a case of transnational drug trafficking from Thailand to Cambodia
column4: and seized more than 15 kilograms of drugs.------On February 06
column6: the Special Forces of the Anti-Narcotics Division (A11)
column7: investigating cross-border drug trafficking from Thailand to Cambodia raided a property in Sen Sok District
column10: along with 15 kg of what is thought to be methamphetamine. ------POST NEWS
